=head1 NAME

Net::LDAP::BER -- BER encoding for LDAP

=head1 SYNOPSIS

  use Net::LDAP::BER;
  
  $ber = Net::LDAP::BER->new;
  
  $ber->encode( # A bind encode
    SEQUENCE => [
      INTEGER  => $mesg->mesg_id,
      REQ_BIND => [
        INTEGER     => $version,
        LDAPDN      => $dn || "",
        $auth_type  => $passwd
      ],
      OPTIONAL => [ BER => $ctrl ]
    ]
  );
  
  $ber->decode( # The decode in Net::LDAP::Message
    $self->result_tag => [
      ENUM     => \$code,
      STRING   => \$dn,
      STRING   => \$error,
      OPTIONAL => [ 
        LDAP_REFERRAL => [
          STRING => $referral = []
        ]
      ]
    ]
  );

=head1 DESCRIPTION

C<Net::LDAP::BER> is a sub-class of L<Convert::BER> and inherits all its
methods from L<Convert::BER>. It defines the following tags

=over 20

=item REQ_BIND

[APPLICATION 0] SEQUENCE

=item REQ_UNBIND

[APPLICATION 2] NULL

=item REQ_SEARCH

[APPLICATION 3] SEQUENCE

=item REQ_MODIFY

[APPLICATION 6] SEQUENCE

=item REQ_ADD

[APPLICATION 8] SEQUENCE

=item REQ_DELETE

[APPLICATION 10] STRING

=item REQ_MODDN

[APPLICATION 12] SEQUENCE

=item REQ_COMPARE

[APPLICATION 15] SEQUENCE

=item REQ_ABANDON

[APPLICATION 16] INTEGER

=item REQ_EXTEND

[APPLICATION 17] SEQUENCE

=item RES_BIND

[APPLICATION 1] SEQUENCE

=item RES_SEARCH_ENTRY

[APPLICATION 4] SEQUENCE

=item RES_SEARCH_RESULT

[APPLICATION 5] SEQUENCE

=item RES_SEARCH_REF

[APPLICATION 19] SEQUENCE

=item RES_MODIFY

[APPLICATION 7] SEQUENCE

=item RES_ADD

[APPLICATION 9] SEQUENCE

=item RES_DELETE

[APPLICATION 11] SEQUENCE

=item RES_MODDN

[APPLICATION 13] SEQUENCE

=item RES_COMPARE

[APPLICATION 15] SEQUENCE

=item RES_EXTEND

[APPLICATION 24] SEQUENCE

=item AUTH_NONE

[CONTEXT 0] STRING

=item AUTH_SIMPLE

[CONTEXT 0] STRING

=item AUTH_KRBV41

[CONTEXT 1] STRING

=item AUTH_KRBV42

[CONTEXT 2] STRING

=item AUTH_SASL

[CONTEXT 3] SEQUENCE

=item SASL_CREDENTIALS

[CONTEXT 7] STRING

=item SASL_MECHANISM

STRING

=item FILTER_AND

[CONTEXT 0] SEQUENCE

=item FILTER_OR

[CONTEXT 1] SEQUENCE

=item FILTER_NOT

[CONTEXT 2] SEQUENCE

=item FILTER_EQ

[CONTEXT 3] SEQUENCE

=item FILTER_SUBSTRS

[CONTEXT 4] SEQUENCE

=item FILTER_GE

[CONTEXT 5] SEQUENCE

=item FILTER_LE

[CONTEXT 6] SEQUENCE

=item FILTER_PRESENT

[CONTEXT 7] STRING

=item FILTER_APPROX

[CONTEXT 8] SEQUENCE

=item SUBSTR_INITIAL

[CONTEXT 0] STRING

=item SUBSTR_ANY

[CONTEXT 1] STRING

=item SUBSTR_FINAL

[CONTEXT 2] STRING

=item LDAPDN

STRING

=item LDAP_CONTROLS

[CONTEXT 0] SEQUENCE

=item LDAP_REFERRAL

[CONTEXT 3] SEQUENCE

=item EXTEND_REQ_NAME

[CONTEXT 0] STRING

=item EXTEND_REQ_VALUE

[CONTEXT 1] STRING

=item MOD_SUPERIOR

[CONTEXT 0] STRING

=back
